traits.name: Amphibious
entries: Gar can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Gar fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Water Walk
entries: Gar can stand and move on liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground.

traits.name: Watery Fall
entries: When Gar drops to 0 hit points, his body collapses into a pool of inky water that rapidly disperses. Anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Gar makes two melee attacks, one with his claw and one with {@item Drown|PotA}.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13). Until the grapple ends, Gar can't attack other creatures with his claw.

actions.name: Drown
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) cold damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Gar is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following druid spells prepared:
